Manage databases with gulp!
===========================

## Installation

```bash
npm i -D gulp-db
```

## Usage

```js
var gulp = require('gulp');
var dbTask = require('gulp-db')(opts);

gulp.task('db:create', dbTask.create('database_name'));
gulp.task('db:drop', dbTask.drop('database_name'));
```

### Options

The options object can specify anything that [manage-database](https://www.npmjs.org/package/manage-database) understands: `user`, `database`, `password`, `port`, `host` and `dialect`.
